üöÄ Performance Marketing & Brand Awareness

UGC videos that sell.
No amateurism.

Most UGC creators "just film". I create advertising. As a professional actor, I know how to hold attention, deliver emotion, and convince the viewer to take action. Increase your ROI with content that has a strategy.

Why risk with amateurs,
when you can have a pro?

Marketing managers often struggle with the unreliability of influencers. With me, it's different. I approach UGC like a commission for television ‚Äì professionally, on time, and according to specifications.

  • Acting PerformanceI can play the "enthusiastic customer" or the "serious expert". Believably.
  • Technical QualityI film on iPhone 15 Pro or Cinema camera. Your brand won't look cheap.
  • Hook & RetentionI know how to stop scrolling in the first 3 seconds.

How does the collaboration work?

01

Briefing & Strategy

Send me a brief or we'll brainstorm a concept that sells together.

02

Script & Hook

I'll prepare a script focused on holding attention (retention).

03

Production

I film and edit the video including subtitles and voiceover.

04

Delivery

You get the finished video ready for Ads Manager.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How much does one UGC video cost?

The price depends on the length, number of videos (packages are more cost-effective), and production requirements. Contact me for a price list.

Do I need to send the product?

Yes, for an authentic video, I need to have the product physically with me. I can send it back after filming.

How soon will the video be ready?

I typically deliver the first preview within 3-5 business days after receiving the product.

Does the price include advertising rights?

Yes, the price usually includes rights for use in ads (Usage Rights) for 12 months.

Looking for a professional voice too?

In addition to a face, I can also lend my voice to your brand. Ideal for spots, ads, or e-learning. Professional studio and fast delivery.

Ready to dominate social media?

Don't leave your brand to chance. Work with a professional who delivers results.

I create videos. Reels, TikTok & Full Production. Partner SocialVids.
